title: EDA and LSTM-CNN
description: General informationIn this kernel I'll work with data from Quora Insincere Questions Classification Competition. This dataset is interesting for NLP researching. We will try to find insincere questions which aren't usefull or are even harmful. I'll do a simple EDA and try an LSTM-CNN model.
